abstract: An article on Tuesday about the financial struggles of large banks erroneously included one bank among several seeking to raise additional capital to shore up their balance sheets. While Merrill Lynch, JPMorgan Chase and Wachovia have indeed announced such plans, Wells Fargo has not.

lead_paragraph: An article on Tuesday about the financial struggles of large banks erroneously included one bank among several seeking to raise additional capital to shore up their balance sheets. While Merrill Lynch, JPMorgan Chase and Wachovia have indeed announced such plans, Wells Fargo has not.
